DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to review studies and patient symptoms before and after laparoscopic Heller myotomy to assess outcomes following laparoscopic surgery for achalasia.
DOC.brief_title: Outcome of Symptoms in Patients Undergoing a Heller Myotomy
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will answer questionnaires before and after surgery to evaluate their symptoms of achalasia and will also have their charts reviewed for relevant medical information.
DOC.criteria: Patients with achalasia who have had laparoscopic Heller myotomies for the treatment of achalasia No patients under the age of 18 will be included
